metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22570 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description: Nullptr dereference when a null char is present in a proto symbol. Thesymbol is parsed incorrectly, leading to an unchecked call into the protofile's name during generation of the resulting error message. Since thesymbol is incorrectly parsed, the file is nullptr. We recommend upgradingto version 3.15.0 or greater.

criterions.comment: protobuf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
